amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to establish a conservation incentives landowner education program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3182 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3182 proposed by Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3182 proposed by Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3182 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
